name: San Francisco Medical Examiner/Coroner's Office
description: The Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME) provides forensic death investigation services for the public and agencies of the City and County of San Francisco. The neutral forensic scientists at OCME will: - Investigate sudden, unexpected, and violent deaths Please NOTE The Medical Examiner's office does not provide copies of Death Certificates. Follow instructions under the service entitled GET a San Francisco death Certificate for more information.
